A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Very disappointing.  After the Force Awakens I immediately looked forward to the next (this movie).  After a couple years of waiting this was a complete let down for me.  This was not the Luke Skywalker of the original trilogy.  Many of the plot setups from TFA were ignored or tossed aside.  I don't feel any reason to look forward to or care if there is a next movie in the series.
